body:
Will the handler dump packets received on Netty directly or dumping will happen after packets are decoded?

Example: If I want to dump TLS packets using the handler, will it be possible? I don't wanna dump content decrypted from those TLS packets.
@hyperxpro depends where you put the handler in the pipeline :)
@devesh-shetty sure thing ... Let me know if you have any specific question. Basically it is just about porting the SwiftNIO code to Java :)
Will we be writing our own Pcap Writer or some third party library?
Thanks @normanmaurer - will ask questions if I'm puzzled about something.
@hyperxpro I think we can write our own... Looking at the SwiftNIO code it seems like this shouldn't be too much work for our use-case.

@normanmaurer I got some free time so thought I should give it a shot. I took a look at the SwiftNIO code and it writes TCP Flags too (FIN, ACK, SYN, etc). I'm wondering how we'll be able to do that with Java? I mean, we can't look at TCP Packet Flags without some Pcap library, AFAIK. Can you help me here?
The SwiftNIO one makes them up. ðŸ˜‰
@hyperxpro as @Lukasa said... these are just "dummy values".
